plugins.name: Condens
plugins.description:
With the Condens plugin, you can quickly import highlights from Condens into FigJam. This keeps your insights intact, preserving key details like participant names and links back to the original data.


Perfect for brainstorming, organizing ideas, and running synthesis workshops with your team â€” without losing the context behind your research, even when switching between tools.


How it works:

  1. Export your highlights from Condens as a CSV file.
  2. Open the Condens plugin in FigJam and upload the CSV file.
  3. Your Highlights are instantly converted into sticky notes, complete with the respondentâ€™s name and a direct link back to the original data in Condens, ready to use in your FigJam board.


Contact us for support, book a demo to get a personalized walkthrough, or visit our Help Center for more information.

If you're not using Condens yet, start your free 15-day trial at condens.io.
plugins.tagline: Import Highlights from Condens into Figjam

plugins.name: Tazym
plugins.description:
Introducing Tazym, the ultimate Figma plugin that streamlines the design-to-web process. With Tazym, you can effortlessly upload your designs to the cloud, generating a unique URL that allows you to update your design in Figma in real-time. Say goodbye to manual website updates or the need to rely on developers. With Tazym, you are the creator, and you own your designs.


Getting started with Tazym is easy. Simply select your design, name it, choose a format (SVG, PNG, or JPG), and voila - you have a URL that can be used anywhere to showcase your work. When inspiration strikes and you want to make updates, it's as easy as editing in Figma and hitting the Update button in Tazym. Your users will see your latest creations instantly.


Ready to take control of your designs and streamline your workflow? Visit tazym.com to learn more and start using Tazym today!
plugins.tagline: Export your Figma designs to URLs. Edit them any time.

plugins.name: Smart Rename
plugins.description:
Smart Rename is a powerful Figma plugin built to streamline your workflow by letting you bulk rename frames customizable base names and smart suffixes like version numbers, dimensions, or sequence numbers.


It also fixes a common frustration in UI design: decimal positioning. When frames have non-integer X or Y values, exported assets often end up with unwanted white lines or blurry edges. Smart Rename solves this by auto-aligning frames to the nearest whole pixel, ensuring clean, sharp exports every time.


From organization to export-readiness, this plugin saves time and eliminates manual, error-prone tasksâ€”all in a few clicks.
plugins.tagline: Bulk rename and align Figma frames in seconds. Add version, size, or number suffixes effortlessly.

plugins.name: Lighthouse
plugins.description:
Lighthouse helps designers check Lottie animation compatibility across iOS, Android, and Web. It scans Figma frames, detects unsupported features like shadows, blurs, etc., and lists issues directly on affected layers. Double-click to jump to problem layers and get instant updates as you fix themâ€”ensuring a smooth animation workflow.


How to Use Lighthouse:

1ï¸âƒ£ Select a Frame â€“ Open Lighthouse and choose a frame to analyze.

2ï¸âƒ£ Instant Issue Detection â€“ View a list of unsupported animation features.

3ï¸âƒ£ Quick Fix Navigation â€“ Double-click an issue to select the affected layer.

4ï¸âƒ£ Live Updates â€“ Changes update instantly as you fix issues.

5ï¸âƒ£ Final Check & Export â€“ Ensure compatibility for seamless Lottie animations.

6ï¸âƒ£ Mark frames â€“ Mark frames that are ready for animation to avoid confusion and ensure efficient workflow.


Simplify your motion design process with Lighthouse! ğŸš€

plugins.name: Consistify
plugins.description:
With the Consistify plugin, you can be be able to:


Detect Design Inconsistencies: Scan multiple frames for discrepancies in font styles, colors, buttons, iconography(coming soon), spacing, and navigation elements(coming soon) etc.


Get Visual Feedback: Receive clear, color-coded tags indicating inconsistencies, with direct frame references and numerical comparisons for easy analysis.


Streamline Workflow(coming soon): Highlight design issues directly in the UI, allowing users to click and focus on problematic frames, helping maintain design system integrity across projects.


To use the Consistify plugin, follow these steps:


Open your design in Figma.

Select at least 2 frames you want to compare for inconsistencies.

Run the Plugin


Advanced Features(coming son:


Accessibility Checker: Analyze contrast ratios in real-time for WCAG compliance.

Component Management: Identify duplicate components and track usage statistics.


Design System Health Monitoring: Flag inconsistent color usage, manual overrides on text styles, and mismatched font sizes.


The plugin is a must-have tool for ensuring cohesive, well-structured designs while saving time on manual checks.

accepted.name: Nyekachi Wihioka
accepted.description: Product Designer passionate about creating seamless, user-centered experiences. Building tools that empower designers to work smarter and faster.

plugins.tagline: Streamline design workflows by detecting inconsistencies and ensuring design system integrity.

plugins.name: EasyMemo
plugins.description:
EasyMemo is a versatile plugin for creating, editing, and managing text memos within Figma. With EasyMemo, you can easily add colorful sticky notes, shapes with text, and simple text nodes to your canvas, helping to keep your workspace organized.


Key Features:


Memo Creation and Editing: Simply enter your text, select your desired memo type, and create memos effortlessly. You can edit memos directly on the canvas, and updates are reflected in real-time.

Customizable Colors: Choose colors from a preset color palette, allowing you to categorize and prioritize memos. The text color automatically adjusts for optimal readability based on the selected background color.

Easy Management:


Organize Memos in a List: Add memos to a list for better organization. You can update or delete memo texts directly from the list. The list is scrollable and always up-to-date.

Batch Generation: Easily generate all listed memos at once. Just click the "Create Shapes" button, and all memos will be neatly arranged on the canvas.

Efficient Layout: Memos are generated in the center of the viewport, focusing on the most relevant areas. They are neatly arranged to avoid overlap.

User-Friendly Interface: The modern and intuitive design features a clearly laid-out text input area, radio buttons for selecting memo types, a color palette, and a dynamically updating list.

How to Use:


Enter Text: Input your memo content in the text input area.

Select Memo Type: Choose from shapes with text, simple text, or sticky notes using the radio buttons.

Pick a Color: Select a color from the palette to categorize your memos. The selected color applies to the memo background, and the text color adjusts automatically.

Add to List: Press the Enter key to add the memo to the list. You can edit or delete memos directly within the list.

Generate Memos: Click the "Create Shapes" button to generate all memos on the canvas at once. Memos are centered in the viewport and neatly arranged.

EasyMemo is the perfect tool for organizing ideas and feedback within your Figma projects. Whether brainstorming, planning, or collaborating, EasyMemo simplifies memo management and supports you efficiently.

plugins.name: strings_repository
plugins.description:
Simple plugin to synchronise translations with strings repository. Allows to push and pull translations from your own server. Works with active selection to speedup parsing processes.


Usage:

Enter connection details and press connect button.

After selection of element press "refresh selection" to get text labels from selection.

Press "pull" to fetch translations from remote server.

Press "apply" to apply translations from selected translations to document selection.

Press "push" to send translations to remote server.
plugins.tagline: Synchronize your translations

plugins.name: FigJam Export to Markdown or JSON
plugins.description:
Turn sticky-note chaos into structured documentation.


This plugin reads your FigJam board, detects heading hierarchies by the number of â­ star stamps on each card, and exports a clean outline â€“ perfect for journey-maps, service blueprints, research affinity walls or any workshop board that needs to become a report.


What you get

â€¢ Markdown or JSON with true heading levels (H1 / H2 / â€¦).

â€¢ Bullet lists for every sticky-note or text card.

â€¢ Embedded screenshots and photos â€“ automatically resized, placed under the right heading and zipped into an assets/ folder.

â€¢ One-click download; whole page or just the frames you select.


How it works

1 Structure top-down

Place headings above their content; the headingâ€™s width defines the column below it.

2 Stamp to mark hierarchy

3 identical stars = H1,â€ƒ2 stars = H2,â€ƒ1 or 0 = regular content.

(Stars sitting on an image are ignored.)

3 Click â€œDownload MDâ€ or â€œDownload JSONâ€

Text-only boards produce a single file; boards with images are delivered as a ready-to-share .zip.


Stop rebuilding journey maps slide-by-slide. Export once, drop the Markdown into Notion, Confluence or GitHub â€“ or feed the JSON into your own reporting pipeline.
plugins.tagline: From FigJam to finished journey-map reports in one click â€“ stamp, export, done.

plugins.name: Import/Export and manager variables - Lazy Variables
plugins.description:
Lazy variables is plugin that allows you to import/export multiple collections in variables and connect with remote collections from the team library. It enables seamless integration with shared design tokens, ensuring consistency across projects and teams.


Additionally, the tool helps you quickly search for variables, modify any value, and manage each variable individually. By streamlining the process of updating and maintaining design tokens, codeSyntax, it enhances collaboration, improves workflow efficiency, and optimizes your design process.

plugins.name: Class Action
plugins.description:
Class Action is a powerful CSS-like styling tool that revolutionizes how designers work with consistent design tokens and variables in Figma. Create Tailwind-inspired class libraries, UI kits, and design templates with ease, then apply saved styles instantly to other frames with a single click.


Key features:

  1. Create and manage reusable style classes similar to CSS and Tailwind classes
  2. Build and apply complete UI kits and design templates across multiple frames
  3. Preserve Figma variables, color tokens, and style references in your templates
  4. Full support for Tailwind-like utility classes, component styles, and design tokens
  5. Premium version with unlimited style classes and advanced template management


Class Action brings CSS and Tailwind-inspired workflows to Figma by eliminating repetitive styling tasks. Perfect for design systems, UI kit creation, template libraries, and maintaining visual consistency across projects. Save time, reduce styling errors, and keep your designs perfectly aligned with your component library or Tailwind-like system.


Compatible with both light and dark Figma themes, supports variable tokens for responsive templates, and optimized for performance even in large UI kit files with complex component libraries.
plugins.tagline: Think as a designer, act like a developer.

136903.release_notes:
This update introduces powerful new control features and interface improvements that provide more precise management over how styles are applied to your Figma elements. The plugin now offers granular property selection and enhanced user experience consistency throughout the interface.

New in this release:
â€¢ Selective Property Application System: Choose exactly which properties to apply from saved classes with granular category control (Dimensions, Layout, Appearance, Fills, Strokes, Effects, Variables, Grids, Position)
â€¢ Persistent Property Preferences: Class-specific scope settings are remembered and indicated with visual markers for streamlined workflows
â€¢ Enhanced CSS Property Display: ClassDetails modal now shows only valid CSS properties, filtering out Figma-specific attributes for cleaner code reference
â€¢ Standardized Interface Components: Unified text styling across all modal dialogs for improved visual consistency
â€¢ Updated Promotional Pricing: Summer special offer with 50% discount (â‚¬4.50/year instead of â‚¬9/year) using code Y0NTY0NA
â€¢ Improved Import/Export Compatibility: Enhanced data format support ensures seamless class sharing across different plugin versions

These enhancements provide more control over style application while maintaining the plugin's focus on efficiency and precision. The selective application system addresses user requests for more granular control without compromising the streamlined workflow that makes Class Action effective for rapid Figma design iterations.
136903.tagline: Think as a designer, act like a developer.

LARAÂ® For Figma provides access to an auto-generated searchable library of your approved promotional material that automatically identifies claims.

Keep historical brand knowledge in one place to easily find exactly the language you're looking for.

LARAÂ® can be seamlessly updated as you get new content approved, cutting out the need to manually update a catalog.

Keep your data safe and secure in the cloud instead of in someone's head or filing cabinet.


*Subscription is required to log into the plug-in. Please contact the Lithero team for more information at https://lithero.com/

plugins.name: Geometric Tile Pattern SVG Generator
plugins.description:
Geometric Pattern Generator is a Figma plugin for creating beautiful, customizable geometric patterns. Built for designers who need professional-quality patterns fast, this plugin provides generation with granular control.


Key Features:


  1. Smart Generation: Instantly create unique patterns with randomized settings or manually adjust rows, columns, block size, colors, and big blocks chances
  2. Multiple Export Options: Download as PNG or SVG, or insert patterns directly into your Figma canvas as vector or raster graphics
  3. Developer-Friendly: View and copy HTML & CSS code, raw SVG markup, or URL-encoded versions for seamless web integration
  4. Smooth Workflow: Intuitive interface with real-time preview, smooth animations, and one-click generation


Perfect for creating backgrounds, textures, brand elements, or decorative graphics. Generate backgrounds for apps, websites, presentations, or print materials, get professional geometric patterns that would take hours to create manually â€“ in just seconds.

From concept to code, this plugin bridges the gap between design and development, making it essential for modern design workflows.

plugins.name: Lock All Ratios
plugins.description:
### Features


Base on the new official figma feature Aspect Ratio Locked


- ğŸ–¼ï¸ **Batch Operations**: Lock/unlock aspect ratios of multiple images with one click

- ğŸ” **Smart Filtering**:

- Filter by ratio: Quickly find images with the same aspect ratio

- Filter by lock state: Easily distinguish between locked and unlocked images

- ğŸ‘€ **Preview Features**:

- Thumbnail previews

- Display image dimensions and ratios

- Click to locate images on canvas

- ğŸŒ **Bilingual**: Supports both English and Chinese interfaces


### Use Cases

- When maintaining consistent image ratios

- Processing large numbers of image resources

- Organizing and checking image ratios

- Quickly locating images with specific ratios


### How to Use

1. Select images to process

2. Use top filters to filter images as needed

3. Operate individually or in batch

4. Click image thumbnails or names to locate them on canvas


### Quick Operations

- Select/Deselect All: Use the checkbox in the table header

- Quick Filter: Use the ratio and lock state filters at the top

- Batch Operations: Use "Lock All"/"Unlock All" buttons in the bottom toolbar

- Refresh List: Use the refresh button in the bottom toolbar


---

plugins.name: Text to file
plugins.description: The Text to File Plugin allows you to easily convert your text into various file formats. Whether you need a simple .txt file or a more advanced .pdf, this plugin gives you the flexibility to save your content quickly and efficiently. With just a few clicks, turn your written ideas into downloadable files for seamless sharing and storage.

plugins.name: Grid Counter
plugins.description: Grid Counter calculates how many grid columns or rows a selected element spans within its parent frame. To use, simply select an element inside a frame with a layout grid, and the plugin will display the number of columns or rows it spans. It updates in real-time as you select different elements. You can also adjust the grid columns with a click of a button.

accepted.name: Jean Candelier
accepted.description: Front End Web Developer. Former Figma employee.

plugins.tagline: Instantly measure grid spans for any selected element.

plugins.name: Silent Sweep
plugins.description:
Silent Sweep is your go-to Figma plugin for effortlessly managing concealed elements in your designs. This powerful tool scans your current page, revealing all hidden layers within each frame and artboard.

With its intuitive card-based interface, you can quickly identify and select hidden elements, streamlining your cleanup process.


Key Features:


  1. Instant Detection: Automatically finds all hidden layers on your current page.
  2. Organized View: Displays hidden layers grouped by their parent frames for easy navigation.
  3. Selective Cleanup: Choose which hidden layers to remove with simple checkboxes.
  4. Real-time Updates: Refreshes automatically when you switch pages or make changes.
  5. Efficient Workflow: Helps maintain clean, organized Figma files without tedious manual searching.


Whether you're polishing up a final design or inheriting a complex file, Silent Sweep helps you maintain a tidy workspace. Say goodbye to forgotten hidden layers and hello to cleaner, more manageable Figma projects. Simplify your design process and boost your productivity with Silent Sweep â€“ your personal cleanup assistant in Figma
plugins.tagline: Unveil and Tidy: Your Hidden Layer Ally
